title: The Director and the film: David Lean
creator_credit: Hazel Wilkinson and British Film Institute
brief_description: David Lean in a discussion with actress Maureen Pryor, comments on the aims and techniques he used in ‘The Sound Barrier’, ‘Brief Encounter’, ‘Bridge on the River Kwai’ and ‘Summer Madness’. (nb: A black and white film except for the extract from ‘Summer madness’ which is colour)
